name: Laser Pushy
description:
A little wooden robot finds itself trapped in an ominous factory. Can you redirect the many lasers that litter the complex and help the flammable fellow to the exit?

A super short jam game made for the NCSU Video Game Development Club's 2021 Spook Jam!

The Team:

Adam Imbert (Programming)

Pranav Kumar (Design, Art)

Austin Bridger (Music, Sound)
